data.message:
Can anyone please help me? 
I changed my passcode on my other Facebook account and forgot it two days ago, I had that account since 2009 and I no longer have the email address and phone number. I can't ask my friends to help me with information because my page is private. Please help me I don't want to lose my account?

replies.message: Hey Shaqueta. You can learn how to recover an old account you can't log into here: http://bit.ly/2zM0QKQ. -Kiara
I can't click recover old because I CNT log in to my account its not hacked .. I just forgot my pass code
